Package controller

Class PaymentControl

java.lang.Object
controller.PaymentControl
public class PaymentControl extends Object
PaymentControl handles all of the logic behind the Order creation process

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PaymentControl()
    Constructs a new PaymentControl object, initialising OrderCrud and ProductCrud objects used to interact with the database

  • Constructor Details

    • PaymentControl

      public PaymentControl() throws SQLException
      Constructs a new PaymentControl object, initialising OrderCrud and ProductCrud objects used to interact with the database
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown if an error occurs when connecting to the db

  • Method Details

    • checkFields

      public void checkFields(JTextField fName, JTextField lName, JTextField cardNumber, JPasswordField cvv, JComboBox<String> expiryMonth, JComboBox<String> expiryYear) throws ValidationException
      Checks all of the fields within the PaymentPanel for some specified form of validation
      Parameters:
      fName - JTextField representing the cardholders First Name
      lName - JTextField representing the cardholders Last Name
      cardNumber - JTextField representing the card number
      cvv - JPasswordField representing thee CVV
      expiryMonth - JComboBox representing the 12 months of the year
      expiryYear - JComboBox representing the next 6 years
      Throws:
      ValidationException - Exception thrown if an error occurs with validating the data

    • makeOrder

      public void makeOrder(Cart cart, Order order) throws ValidationException
      Makes an order and inserts the details of the order into the DB. Also makes a payment object for future expansion
      Parameters:
      cart - The customers cart
      order - The customers order
      Throws:
      ValidationException - Exception for if the user enters invalid data

    • checkInfo

      public void checkInfo(JTextField txt, String fieldName) throws EmptyFieldException
      Valid a text field method, encapsulates common code
      Parameters:
      txt - The JTextField object
      fieldName - for displaying the correct field name in the error message
      Throws:
      EmptyFieldException - occurs when an input field that is required is left empty
